alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 9:59PM CDT until July 30 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Cherry County in north central Nebraska... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 959 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Merriman, or 26 miles south of Martin, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Medicine Lake, Highway 61 Crossing The Niobrara River, Intersection of Highway 61 and Shadbolt Road and Highway 61 crossing the Snake River. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 200 and 220. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
